description:
V Juri F, whole name Victor Juri Frankenstein, is a nurse who runs a clinic in Sakurashin. She has her own TV show called the Juri Channel. She appears to have superhuman strength, however she is really a human. Akina comes by to her clinic to get himself check over because of his tuning ability and can re-tune him.
Juri used to be an assistant for http://anidb.net/ch3390 [Hime] when Hime was a child and had finally become mayor of Sakurashin.
The V and F in her name stands for "Victor Frankenstein", the name of her ancestor and http://anidb.net/ch20471 [Mariabelle]`s father making her Mariabelle`s great-grandniece as Juri is a descendant of Mariabelle brother.
Source: Wikipedia
name: V Juri F
